text: The 1976 Prize of Moscow News was the eleventh edition of an international figure skating competition organized in Moscow, Soviet Union. It was held December 8–12, 1976. Medals were awarded in the disciplines of men's singles, ladies' singles, pair skating and ice dancing. ==Men== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Rank ! Name !
